room_title: Escape room "The Slasher" by Room With A Clue in Hartford
room_description: The Slasher has spent many years in prison plotting his escape. Sentenced to the gas chamber ten years ago, he has had plenty of time to plan. In a sick twist, he has managed to lock you and your fellow correction officers in the warden's office and has prepared a big surprise for you! If you can unravel his trail of clues, then you may be able to escape with your lives.
